creator: rvanoo@xs4all.nl
text:
Added a cmpversion attribute to ejbjar. Takes a value of either "1.0" or "2.0". 
Nested container-specific elements (such as the jboss element) can use this as 
a switch (enhancement for jboss is underway).

creator: rvanoo@xs4all.nl
text:
Created attachment 3979
Improved patch. Required for improved patch of Bug# 14709

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de

problems.
